ygData.subject: Re: Levitate 'Fixed'?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think the problem was with people reusing the pegasus cloak really quickly to gain altitude. ... Yeah, though it too seems to be limited by the 6 second
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 20 Jan 2000 Mike.Langlois@... wrote:
>
> Say, I saw on the new patch message that Levitate has been
> changed back to allow refresh while active. This is
> because items now have a refresh time.
>
> So, the problem was that people could gain altitude by
> recasting. Casters can't get far 'cause they run outta
> mana.

I think the problem was with people reusing the pegasus cloak
really quickly to gain altitude.

> Did they check this on a Bard this time? My guess, never
> occured to them. I assume we can now gain altitude just
> like we used to.

Yeah, though it too seems to be limited by the 6 second
heartbeat (just like Clarity).

--
